prompts: Create a ghost-type Pokemon with a floating balloon-like body and spooky facial expressions.
Show me a whimsical Pokemon that resembles a purple balloon with yellow accents and a fluffy top.
Imagine a cute yet eerie Pokemon that drifts through the air, radiating a mysterious aura.
Generate a ghostly creature that combines elements of flight and mischief, with a unique color palette.
Design a quirky Pokemon that embodies the essence of wind and mystery with playful visual traits.
I want to see a small, floating Pokemon with a cheerful demeanor but a haunting appearance.
Make a Pokemon that looks like a mix of a balloon and a ghost, perfect for Halloween themes.
